columns.flno: The unique identifier for each flight.
columns.origin: The starting location of the flight.
columns.destination: The endpoint location for the flight.
columns.distance: The distance covered by the flight in miles.
columns.departure_date: The scheduled date and time for departure.
columns.arrival_date: The scheduled date and time for arrival.
columns.price: The cost of the flight ticket.
columns.aid: The unique identifier for the aircraft operating the flight.

flight.table_description: The table captures detailed information about flights.

columns.aid: The unique identifier for each aircraft.
columns.name: The model name of the aircraft.
columns.distance: The maximum distance the aircraft can fly.

aircraft.table_description: The table stores details about various aircraft models.

columns.eid: The unique identifier for each employee.
columns.name: The full name of the employee.
columns.salary: The annual salary of the employee in USD.

employee.table_description: The table provides detailed information about employees.

columns.eid: The unique identifier for each employee associated with the certificate.
columns.aid: The unique identifier for each aircraft linked to the certificate.

certificate.table_description: The table records the association between employees and aircraft certificates.
